metadata.title: CVE-2024-53164 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: sched: fix ordering of qlen adjustmentChanges to sch->q.qlen around qdisc_tree_reduce_backlog() need to happen_before_ a call to said function because otherwise it may fail to notifyparent qdiscs when the child is about to become empty.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-53164` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-extra-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
